issue.title: [CF 461] Addon not working after a DC.
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

If you are experiencing errors that seem to be unrelated to icons, attaching a saved variables file will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved. Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua". Screenshots can be especially helpful if your issue is hard to describe in words.

comments.body:
Thank you for doing as I have asked. As I had suspected, your settings were corrupted when you disconnected. There is a chance that any addon's settings will be lost when you improperly close WoW, especially if you improperly exit WoW after being disconnected in order to try to get back into the game faster, or even if you just simply disconnect.

The problem is not with TellMeWhen, but with the way that WoW saves addon settings. The only way to recover your old settings will be to restore them from a backup if you have one. If you do not have a backup, then unfortunately, you will just have to re-configure everything.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

Ah okey, the thing is I didnt configure anything at all when I installed the addon. It just worked as I wanted. But it's working on my mage, is there any chances I can get the settings from there over to my shaman?

dont think I have a backup since I tried to reinstall the addon several times.

Edited Mar 11, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user skeeeig

I'm not sure what you mean when you say that you didn't configure anything when you installed TMW - it cannot read your mind, so you must have either imported settings from somewhere else or have configured it at a previous date.

If you wish to copy your mage's settings over to your shaman's profile, then open up TMW's options ("/tmw options") and click on "Profiles" on the left hand side of the window that appears.

You now have two choices:

  • Use the same profile as your mage - changes made on either character will be reflected on the other:
    • Select your mage's profile from the "Existing Profiles" dropdown menu.
  • Copy your mage's profile to your shaman - changes made on either character will NOT be reflected on the other:
    • Select your mage's profile from the "Copy From" dropdown menu.
